special:

threat: A local attacker could exploit this to read certain information, leading to a loss of privacy.
A remote attacker could exploit this to crash the system, leading to a denial of service.
A local unprivileged attacker could exploit this causing a denial of service.
A local unprivileged attacker could exploit this to crash the system, leading to a denial of service.
A local attacker could exploit this to cause a kernel oops.
A remote attacker could exploit this to crash the system, leading to a denial of service.
A remote attacker could use this flaw to crash the system.
